subNodes.conversationText: root

Wow, that kitten of yours sure can battle.  Thank you and Melia, for opening my eyes.  I didn't want to believe that Suna would ever turn on me.  I would like to spend a few moments here, then I'll return home.|***chk_talk_times_1-->NOT::False    |
What do we have here, a lost boy, his lady friend, and a kitten.  May I ask what you are doing in our land?
Your land?
Yes.  This land belongs to the Zenton Robbers.
And who might Zenton be?
He is the founder of our great society.
Continue
He has been dead for thousands of years.
Continue

Yes, but his teachings live on.  I discovered some writtings amoung the ruins.  Much of the writtings were of no interest to me, but there was a small portion that counted the history of the Zenton Robbers.
Continue
My friends and I have taken the oaths of Zenton and are currently searching for more recruits.  Would you be interested?
Continue
Darstin, is that you?
Continue

Melia?  Yes, it is I.  Last year, while exploring the ruins, I met Suna.  She had been hiding here for a few months and was studying the records she found.  The stories of wealth and power were enchanting.  We decided to take the oaths.
Continue
We began venturing into Charn for more recruits.  We had to be careful.  Suna has a criminal record and they have been looking for her.
And what makes you believe that Suna will not kill you when the time is right.  Two can not share such power.
The oaths cannot be broken.
Continue
But they were broken before.  What makes you believe a liar and thief, such as this Suna, will not betray you.
Continue
We care about each other, that is why.
Caring is based on trust and integrity.  These are not qualities of robbers and murders.  Suna is using you and the others for her own gain.
What...I do not believe you...Suna would never betray me.  Tell them, Suna!
Continue
Darstin, I would never lie to you or the others.
Sorry we can't stay longer.  We must be going now.
Fools, you are not going anywhere.  Those who discover our hideout must join or be destroyed.
Continue
I think we should let Melia go.  She was always kind to me.
Continue
You have feelings for this girl?
Continue
It's not like that.  She is my cousin and a good friend.|***set_talk_times_1-->|
Continue
You take me for a fool.  You lie, traitor!  You would break our oaths for this women.  Sandrik, Sila, kill them all.
Continue|***darstin_help-->|
So naive!  You have allowed her to seduce you.  Can't you see that she is lying.
She is not lying and I am seduced by no one.  I have studied the teachings myself.
And what have you learned from these teachings?
That all those who discover our hideout, must join or die.|***set_talk_times_1-->|
We do not wish to cause you harm, Darstin.
Fight or don't fight.  Either way, your life has come to an end!
Continue|***darstin_attack-->|
